name: usgruhgr

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c0, cupgr))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ USGraph, c0 ∈ UHGraph, c0 ∈ UPGraph)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cuhgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cupgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c0, cuhgr))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ UHGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ UPGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ UPGraph → c0 ∈ UHGraph)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cuhgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cupgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c0, cuhgr))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ UHGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ UPGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ UPGraph → c0 ∈ UHGraph)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cuhgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c0, cuhgr))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ UHGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ UPGraph → c0 ∈ UHGraph)

comment: A simple graph is an undirected hypergraph. (Contributed by AV, 9-Feb-2018.) (Revised by AV, 15-Oct-2020.)
